name: The Raintime
description:
The Raintime is a freeware visual novel, currently in production, about the psyche of the undeveloped mind. We will be releasing a short story demo version in Summer 2019. The full game release is planned for Spring 2020.

The Raintime is in development now, please check back for updates!

Excerpt


"Suddenly I've stopped caring about the people at the other table. I pick up the jar of salt again. The refreshing coolness of the glass trinket fills me with newfound confidence. And as I'm sitting there, an inexplicable urge arises within me to stand up with a loud cry, and chuck the little jar against the wall of the restaurant, just above the table where the they're sitting, so that they're showered by salt and broken glass.

I can clearly picture the fearful looks in their eyes, the girl scared to death, the small guy startled, and the big one with a spasmodic, stupid grin on his face. A tingling triumph starts to bubble through my limbs. I'm breaking out in sweat, and I clench the jar firmly in my fist, as it gives me strength.

The glass between my fingers has fogged up completely."
